question: URoger unamabhola ethenisi ama-5. Uthenga amanye amathini ama-2 amabhola ethenisi. Ikani ngalinye linamabhola ethenisi ama-3. Mangaki amabhola ethenisi anawo manje?

Kwakukhona amakhompyutha ayisishiyagalolunye ekamelweni leseva. Kwafakwa amanye amakhompyutha amahlanu nsuku zonke, kusukela ngoMsombuluko kuya kuLwesine. Mangaki amakhompyutha manje asegumbini leseva?
U-Leah wayenoshokholethi abangama-32 kanti udadewabo enama-42. Uma bedle ama-35, basale nezingcezu ezingaki sezizonke?
UShawn unamathoyizi amahlanu. NgoKhisimusi, wathola amathoyizi amabili lilinye kumama wakhe nakuyise. Unamathoyizi amangaki manje?

UMichael wayenamabhola egalufu angama-58. NgoLwesibili, ulahlekelwe amabhola egalufu angama-23. NgoLwesithathu, ulahlekelwe abanye abangu-2. Mangaki amabhola egalofu abenawo ekupheleni kwangoLwesithathu?
U-Olivia une-$23. Wathenga amabheji amahlanu ngo-$3 lilinye. Ingakanani imali asele nayo?
UJason wayenama-lollipop angama-20. Wanikeza uDenny amaloliphu. Manje uJason unama-lollipop angu-12. Mangaki amaloliphu uJason awanika uDenny?
Uma kunezimoto ezi-3 endaweni yokupaka kanye nezinye izimoto ezi-2 zifika, zingaki izimoto ezisendaweni yokupaka?
